lead_paragraph: Dave Cowens joined the Detroit Pistons yesterday as an assistant coach, leaving his job as coach and general manager of the W.N.B.A.’s Chicago Sky. Cowens, a Hall of Fame center with the Boston Celtics in the 1970’s, last coached in the N.B.A. with the Golden State Warriors from 2000-02.
